description:
nova compute manager.update_available_resource() periodic task is not configurable for it's interval. For some case, there might be multiple compute services in one process, so there will be multiple periodic tasks were running in a process, and cpu cycles are mostly occupied by this periodic task as it will also get the resource to the virtualization layer.

It's better to expose this periodic task to be configurable.
title: compute manager update_available_resource interval needs to be configurable
